LanguageData.UPTT_TrackerAlert_tooltip:
UPT stands for UnPaused Time.
This alert measures how long the game has been unpaused for in real time. There is no distinction between different game-speeds other non paused.
The timer begins when you start a new game, load a save or join a multiplayer session; and ends when you Quit to OS, Quit to Main Menu, or leave a multiplayer session.
Hosting a new multiplayer session or converting a multiplayer world back to singleplayer does not reset the timer.
